m_szDocTitle: Local Motors plans to 3D print a car | Fox News
m_szDocSumamry: Local Motors plans to 3D print a car By Antony Ingram Â (Local Motors) Steel stamping and production lines? That's so last-year--what you really want is a 3D printed car. The concept is nothing new, but finding a printer big enough to deal with car panels isn't an easy tax. It's one Local Motors will surmount later this year though, when it 3D prints an electric vehicle in just five days, at the International Manufacturing Technology Show in Chicago. The company is no stranger to the show, having built an entire Rally Fighter off-roader at the show back in 2012, over the event's six days. But 3
